whatsapp_status.prompt:
Professional financial advisory vertical image for WhatsApp status.
            Theme: Wealth creation through systematic investment.
            Colors: Professional blue gradient with gold accents.
            Elements: Growing chart, rupee symbol, happy family silhouette.
            Text overlay: 'Start Your SIP Journey Today'
            Style: Modern, clean, optimistic, mobile-friendly.
            Dimensions: 1080x1920px vertical format.
